{{Use dmy dates|date=June 2011}} {{Use Australian English|date=June 2011}} {{infobox TV channel |name=Disney Junior | logofile = Disney Junior Logo.png | logosize = 200px |size= |launch= 5 December 2005{{cite journal | journal = [[B & T Weekly]] | title = Disney makes new friends| first = Camille | last = Alarcon | section = News | page = 23 | volume = 54 | issue = 2546 | date = 29 May 2011 | accessdate = 15 May 2100 | url = http://bandt.com.au/news/af/0c038faf.asp |issn = 13259210}} ||picture format = [[576i]] ([[SDTV]]) |share= |share as of= |share source= |slogan = Where the Magic Begins |owner=[[The Walt Disney Company]] |country=[[Australia]], [[New Zealand]] |language=[[English language|English]] |broadcast area=[[Australia]], [[New Zealand]], [[Pacific Islands]] |former names=Playhouse Disney (prior to 29 May 2011) |sister names=[[Disney Channel (Australia)|Disney Channel]]
[[Disney XD (Australia)|Disney XD]] coming in 2012 |web = [http://home.disney.com.au/disneyjunior/ disneyjunior.com.au] |terr avail= |sat serv 1=[[Foxtel]] |sat chan 1=Channel 709 |sat serv 2=[[Austar]] |sat chan 2=Channel 709 |sat serv 3=[[SKY Network Television]] |sat chan 3=Channel 045 |cable serv 1=[[Foxtel]] |cable chan 1= Channel 709 |cable serv 2=[[Austar]] |cable chan 2= Channel 709 |cable serv 3=[[Optus Television|Optus TV]] |cable chan 3= Channel 709 |cable serv 4=[[TelstraClear InHomeTV]] |cable chan 4=Channel 45 |cable serv 5=[[Neighbourhood Cable]] |cable chan 5 = Channel 29 |cable serv 6=[[TransACT]] |cable chan 6=Channel 202 }} '''Disney Junior''' is a 24-hour [[Australia]]n [[cable]] and [[satellite]] channel available on [[Foxtel]], [[Austar]] and [[Optus Television|Optus Television's]] subscription platforms. Since late-[[2005]], Playhouse Disney Channel was launched on [[pay television]] provider [[Foxtel]] and its affiliates in [[Australia]], but is only available on its digital service. [[SKY Network Television]] shows Playhouse Disney Channel in [[New Zealand]]. The channel is broadcast 24 hours a day, every day, showing most of the programs seen in the United States. Before Playhouse Disney Channel, Playhouse Disney was shown on [[Disney Channel (Australia)|Disney Channel Australia]] from about 9am to 3pm weekdays, and to 10am until when [[Foxtel]] came and made it to a full 24-hour channel. At 11:00 am 1 November 2007, the channel was added to [[TransACT]].{{cite press release | publisher = [[TransACT]] | date = 2007-11-01 | format = | language = | title = TransACT launches Playhouse Disney on TransTV | trans_title = | url = http://transact.com.au/news/Article.aspx?id=774 | accessdate = 2009-11-10 | archiveurl = | archivedate = | quote = | ref = }} It was formerly available on [[SelecTV (Australian television)|SelecTV]] from September 2008 until the closure of its English service in late 2010.{{cite news | title = WINâs on to a winner as SelecTV ups service | first = Neil | last =Shoebridge | page = 16 | newspaper = [[The Australian Financial Review]] | location = | date = 15 September 2008 | accessdate = 26 February 2010 | url =http://afr.com/p/business/media_marketing/item_Kg8s7HsBJkxV8WVoNsZibJ?hl}}{{cite news | newspaper = [[The Australian]] | title = Bruce Gordon's SelecTV to make changes| first = James | last = Chessell | section = City Beat | page = | date = 20 August 2010 | accessdate = 20 August 2010 | url = http://www.theaustralian.com.au/business/city-beat/bruce-gordons-selectv-to-make-changes/story-fn4xq4cj-1225907617882}} On 1 September 2009 the channel started broadcasting in [[16:9]] [[widescreen]]. The channel relaunched as [[Disney Junior]] on 29 May 2011. {{cite web |url=http://www.bandt.com.au/news/disney-to-launch-junior-channel |title=Disney to launch Junior channel|B&T |publisher='Tim Addington' |accessdate=2011-03-30 }} ==Programming== * ''[[Jake and the Never Land Pirates]] * ''[[Disney Poetry Shorts]] * ''[[Mickey Mousekersize]] * ''[[Special Agent Oso: Three Healthy Steps]] * ''[[Mickey Mouse Clubhouse]] * ''[[Handy Manny]] * ''[[Jungle Junction]] * ''[[Special Agent Oso]] * ''[[The Cat in the Hat Knows a Lot About That!]] * ''[[Imagination Movers]] * ''[[Stella and Sam]] * ''[[Justin Time]] * ''[[All for Kids]] * ''[[Timmy Time]] * ''[[Higglytown Heroes]] * ''[[JoJo's Circus]] * ''[[Willa's Wild Life]] * ''[[Little Einsteins]] * ''[[Chloe's Closet]] * ''[[Numberjacks]] * ''[[The Wiggles]] * ''[[Mama Mirabelle's Home Movies]] * ''[[Bunnytown]] * ''[[WordWorld]] * ''[[Poppets Town]] * ''[[Noddy in Toyland]] * ''[[Clifford the Big Red Dog]] * ''[[Odd Jobbers]] * ''[[Guess How Much I Love You]] * ''[[Animal Mechanicals]] * ''[[Reader Rabbit and Friends]] == References == {{reflist}} ==External links== * [http://home.disney.com.au/disneyjunior/ Disney Junior Australia] {{Disney Channel}} {{Subscription television channels in Australia}} {{Subscription television channels in New Zealand}} [[Category:Disney Channel]] [[Category:Television channels and stations established in 2005]]
